name: Borrow It Forward
address: 47 W 13th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
other_info: Imagine a world where everything has a longer life. Where instead of buying new, you borrow something perfectly good from someone else. That's the vision behind Borrow It Forward. We connect people who have items to lend with those who need them, fostering a community of sharing, sustainability, and smart living

name: Bent Spoon Sculptures
other_info: Transforming kitchen mishaps into magnificent metallic art. Our art is bent, but our commitment to sustainability isn't!

name: HireSwimmer
other_info: HireSwimmer is the revolutionary service dedicated to making your pool time truly effortless. We believe pool exercise should be observed, not endured! Whether you're recovering from an injury, short on time, or simply prefer to enjoy the water from a comfortable lounge chair, our professional lap-swimmers are here to help.
